criterion: Provides a clear and direct answer to the user's question about returning to soccer after a suspected concussion
Incorrectly advises the user to return to soccer without proper medical clearance
Asks follow-up questions to clarify the user's symptoms and concerns
Uses technical jargon or overly complicated language
Provides a general explanation of concussion symptoms and treatment options
Fails to acknowledge the importance of proper medical evaluation before returning to sports
Asks the user if they have seen a doctor or had a proper medical evaluation
Provides a clear explanation of the risks associated with returning to soccer too soon after a concussion
Tells the user to consult a doctor for personalized advice
